Liey: We want to explore the connection between Elder and present the great disasters. No need to go into details. The leadership of our organization is thinking to find the source of evil in the Tower of Kruma. However, we, acting in secret, beyond the power alone to delve into the secrets of the Tower of Kruma. The situation is that we have to send to the Tower of sufficient skilled mercenaries. Of course, Krumas guarantee fee, so on your part will not be any loss.
